content:
When I try to connect to https://fhir.github.io/ I get a PR_CONNECT_ABORTED_ERROR error.
This makes it hard to get the publisher from https://fhir.github.io/latest-ig-publisher/org.hl7.fhir.publisher.jar

Some docco pages give this as the location for the latest version.
there's an... issue... with the sonatype service which means latest isn't always the latest. It appears that the maintainers do not see that as a bug. Anyway, the github link works for me

On the github one I get

Secure Connection Failed

An error occurred during a connection to fhir.github.io. PR_CONNECT_ABORTED_ERROR

    The page you are trying to view cannot be shown because the authenticity of the received data could not be verified.
    Please contact the website owners to inform them of this problem.

Learn moreâ€¦

Report errors like this to help Mozilla identify and block malicious sites
This might be a recent firewall change.
